description.full: Summer Athletics 2009 is the ultimate sports gaming experience for this summer! Compete in 28 disciplines, fight for medals and records, progress through a complete career of your custom made athlete and get ready for the unique Berlin World Cup. Challenge your friends and family and join in on the fun!
